title.rendered: COSCHARIS MOTORS AND JUMIA EXCITE CUSTOMERS WITH BLACK FRIDAY OFFER

content.rendered:
[metaslider id=40060]

 

To excite her numerous customers, Coscharis Motors PLC, has partnered with Jumia the largest online shop in Africa to present a BlackFriday to remember.

 

As part of the partnership offering, Coscharis has put forward some of her vehicle brands specially to Jumia customers at heavily discounted rates. Shoppers on Jumia will also stand a chance to win a brand new Ford Figo during this Black Friday event. 

This offers runs from November 13 to December 13, 2017.  

Click here to see the vehicles on offer. 

Terms and conditions apply
